item.title: High alch working 100x faster
item.dc:creator: @VorargC VorargC
item.description:
@VorargC wrote:

You have to set the alch prices for each item.
You do that in item.cfg,
the shop price and low/high alch prices are the first 3 numbers after the description of the item.

Read full topic

item.title: High alch working 100x faster
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

can som1 fix this so it gives 100x the gold as well?

else if(castSpell == 1178) //High Alch { if(playerLevel[6] >= 55) { alchvaluez = (alchvaluez / 3); deleteItem(castOnItem, castOnSlot, 100); addItem(995, alchvaluez); addSkillXP((65*playerLevel[6]), 6); startAnimation(712); playerGfx(113, 0); newAnimDelay = 6; newAnim = 712; newAnimRequired = true; } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 55) { sendMessage("You need at least 55 Magic to cast High Level Alchemy"); } }
